data.eml:eml: A checklist of Indian armored spiders (Araneae, Tetrablemmidae) with the description of a new species from the Western Ghats

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sankaran, Pradeep M., Sebastian, Pothalil A. (2016): A checklist of Indian armored spiders (Araneae, Tetrablemmidae) with the description of a new species from the Western Ghats. Zootaxa 4084 (3): 443-450, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4084.3.9
